content: hello kitty page �1 of 1� 4 hello kitty what will i need 1 yarn vlnap lada luxus 100g/230m of 4 colors - white code 57076 - black code 59005 just a small amount cca 2-2 5 m - yellow code 54033 just a small amount cca 1-1 5 m - pink code 52723 40g 2 needle for sewing the parts together 3 crochet hook of size 4 the height of hellokitty with these yarns is 29 cm 11 4 inches you can crochet kitty from any other yarn using the referenced hook for that yarn the only difference will be in height abbreviations st stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease by
